title: Feature Request: Move window with keyboard shortcuts
author: bveldkamp
body_snippet:
When I want to move a window to a different monitor, I usually do this with the [Win]+[Shift]+[arrow] keyboard shortcut. This does however not work with mRemoteNG.

Using the mouse to move a maximized window causes the mRemoteNG window to resize, which in turn causes any RDP session to reconnect, which takes some time. Using this keyboard shortcut keeps a window maximized.
